sentence.Network_en: He is callous about the safety of his workers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对他工人的安全毫不关心.

sentence.Network_en: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.
sentence.Network_cn: 殖民者惨绝人寰地屠杀了成千的土著居民.

sentence.Network_en: She was selfish, arrogant and often callous.
sentence.Network_cn: 她自私傲慢,而且往往冷酷无情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... calligraphy ? n. 书法 callous ? adj. 无情的, 冷漠的 callus ? n. 皮肤的硬结，老茧.
医学考博英语1万词汇 - 豆丁网 ... calf n． 小牛；腓;小腿 callous a． 起老茧的;无感觉的;冷淡的 callus n． 胼胝；骨痂，接骨质.
扬子江-GRE填空词汇分类汇总_百度文库 ... discourage 丧失勇气 callous 麻木的，铁石心肠的 dull 迟钝的.
医学考博英语1万词汇 - 豆丁网 ... calf n． 小牛；腓;小腿 callous a． 起老茧的;无感觉的;冷淡的 callus n． 胼胝；骨痂，接骨质.

list.abs: That incarnate no matter how callous profession are full of love ., 体现了不论是多么冷酷的职业 , 都充满着爱.
How am I a callous person ?, 我怎么不是一个冷酷的人?
Walden shook his callous hand ., 沃尔登握了握他那长满老茧的手.
Neatly upon his left ear on the callous pavement two waiters pitched Soapy ., 两个侍者干净利落地把苏贝叉出门外 , 他左耳贴地摔在坚硬的人行道上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the Latin sense): from Latin callosus 'hard-skinned'

entry.def: A callous person or action is very cruel and shows no concern for other people or their feelings.

means.word_mean: 1. make insensitive or callous; deaden feelings or morals

auth_sentence.content: Normally such callous remarks wouldn't receive national attention.
auth_sentence.res_content: Normally such callous remarks wouldn't receive national attention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Normally such callous remarks wouldn't receive national attention.

auth_sentence.content: Is there a more callous quotation in history?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is there a more callous quotation in history?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is there a more callous quotation in history?

auth_sentence.content: It was a callous remark at the best of times.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a callous remark at the best of times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a callous remark at the best of times.

sentences.en: He is callous about the safety of his workers.
sentences.cn: 他对他工人的安全毫不关心。

sentences.en: His cruel and callous comments made me shiver.
sentences.cn: 他残酷无情的批评令我胆寒。
她冷酷无情的态度引起我的反感。

sentences.en: She was selfish, arrogant and often callous.
sentences.cn: 她自私傲慢, 而且往往冷酷无情。
